javadoc.text: * Interface that a component needs to implement if it wants to act as a Piccolo * canvas.
javadoc.author: Lance Good

javadoc.text: * Called to notify PComponent that given bounds need repainting.
* Sends a repaint notification the repaint manager if PComponent is not * already painting immediately.
* Pushes the given cursor onto the cursor stack and sets the current cursor * to the one provided.
javadoc.param: cursor The cursor to set as the current one and push

javadoc.text: * Pops the topmost cursor from the stack and sets it as the current one.
* Sets whether the component is currently being interacted with.
javadoc.param: interacting whether the component is currently being interacted * with
